node.text:
The dreamy setting, the culinary feast and the exquisite service will make you feel extra special all through your holiday. Experience a kind of happiness that comes in waves when you stay at The Raviz Kovalam.
.

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com, reservations@theraviz.com
.
